EmailTemplate.subject: Attending NRF? Join This Q&A on Tackling Your Retail Obstacles
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Retailers have always had to navigate change.
It’s the only constant.
And at NRF 2021, NCR will host a virtual fireside Q&A to discuss how retailers can gain the agility to adapt and get ahead, no matter what that change looks like.
Join NCR’s David Wilkinson, President & GM of NCR Retail and Becca Coggins, Senior Partner at McKinsey for "Change, made simple: How retailers adapt in a shifting environment" <[[https://virtualbigshow.nrf.com/session/change-made-simple-how-retailers-adapt-shifting-environment]]> Thursday, Jan. 14 1:45 pm – 2:15 pm
We’ll answer pressing industry questions, explore today’s big technology advances in store virtualization, touchless self-checkout and next-generation retail architecture, and discuss why now is the time to invest—not rest.
Don’t wait, add the event to your calendar now. And we’ll “see” you at NRF 2021!
